data.title: Indulge in Luxury at Kyle Kurtis Salon & Spa
data.meta_description: Unwind & Rejuvenate at Kyle Kurtis Salon & Spa in North Port & Englewood, FL! We offer hair extensions, facials, massages, nails, waxing, permanent makeup & more! Schedule your appointment today!
data.text:
MEET THE OWNER: KELLY FARLEY

Introducing Kelly, the dedicated owner of Kyle Kurtis Salon & Spa! Stepping into the role with profound reverence for the salonâs esteemed legacy and unwavering commitment to excellence, Kelly is determined to honor Amyâs vision while prioritizing the happiness and satisfaction of our staff and clientele.

Bringing a wealth of experience from the beauty industry and a genuine passion for crafting exceptional salon experiences, Kelly injects a fresh perspective into Kyle Kurtis. She recognizes the importance of staying updated on trends and fostering a welcoming atmosphere for everyone.
